note: Assistant Professor at Bridgewater State University in MA. Formerly CIPR at Tulane and PhD from UT Austin. Louisianan. Originally focused on comparative public policy, especially immigration, with recent work on populism, emotions, and political behavior. Here till a better Twitter clone emerges.
